title: Feminist Movie Friday: Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
itunes:title: Feminist Movie Friday: Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
description:
For this Feminist Movie Friday, we focus in on the beautiful, tragic and powerful music, performances, costuming, and history of Ma Rainey's Black Bottom. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
